rules_text:
{R}{G}, Reveal Living Supernova from your hand: Put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. Activate only as a sorcery.
Whenever Living Supernova or a land you control enters, exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
flavor_text: [i]It's a new dawn, it's a new day.[/i]
notes: Feeling Good — Roar of the Grease Paint, Smell of the Crowd
